  • SEARCH: 
 

Package templeengine.src.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CollisionInterface
    The CollisionInterface is the backbone of the collision system.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animation
    The Animation class holds an array of Frames, which form an animation.
    CollisionCircle
    The CollisionCircle is a circle shaped collider.
    CollisionRectangle
    The CollisionRectangle is a rectangle shaped collider.
    Frame
    The Frame contains data, which to make an Animation out of.
    GameCamera
    The GameCamera class provides the user with the main camera the game uses.
    GameCanvas
    The GameCanvas is the backbone of the game itself.
    GameIO
    The GameIO lets the user easily store Java Properties into files, also provides support for .map files.
    GameLoop
    The GameLoop class runs the innermost JavaFX app game loop.
    GameObject
    The GameObject is a ImageView used for any game object you want to render on screen.
    GameSound
    The GameSound lets the user easily play a sound of their choice.
    GameTime
    The GameTime class is a seperate tick updater from the main JavaFX app.
    Input
    The Input class is an easy way to check whether a key is being pressed or not.
    QuadTree
    The QuadTree is a relatively simple class to help reduce the expensive collision check calls.
    Temple
    The Temple is a JavaFX Application, basically the main class of the engine itself.
    Tile
    The Tile is a GameObject used in a TileMap.
    TileMap
    The TileMap is a class used to construct maps out of Tiles.
    Utilities
    The Utilities class has handy functions for things one might find useful in games.
